sect1.title: Available Documentation

note.title: Online Documentation and Latest Updates
note.para: Documentation for our products is available at , where you can also find the latest updates, and browse or download the documentation in various formats. The latest documentation updates can be found in the English language version.

sect1.para: In addition, the product documentation is available in your installed system under /usr/share/doc/manual. It is included in an RPM package named ses-manual_LANG_CODE. Install it if it is not already on your system, for example:

listitem.para: This guide focuses on deploying a basic &ceph; cluster, and how to deploy additional services. It also cover the steps for upgrading to &productname; &productnumber; from the previous product version.

This guide focuses on routine tasks that you as an administrator need to take care of after the basic &ceph; cluster has been deployed (day 2 operations). It also describes all the supported ways to access data stored in a &ceph; cluster.
This guide focuses on how to ensure your cluster is secure.
This guide takes you through various common problems when running &productname; &productnumber; and other related issues to relevant components such as &ceph; or &ogw;.
This guide describes the integration, installation, and configuration of Microsoft Windows environments and &productname; using the Windows Driver.
